metadata.description: AI Foundry project endpoint (recommended) or legacy Azure OpenAI endpoint. Examples: https://my-project.eastus.api.azureml.ms/ or https://my-openai.openai.azure.com/
Embedding model deployment name in your AI Foundry project or Azure OpenAI. Common values: text-embedding-3-small, text-embedding-3-large, text-embedding-ada-002
Optional: AI Foundry project resource ID for assigning Entra App role. Format: /subscriptions/{sub}/resourceGroups/{rg}/providers/Microsoft.MachineLearningServices/workspaces/{project}
